name: Jelly & Monster
description:
Inspired by the game PAC-MAN but made it more on the concept of "Invasion" by keeping the theme of the game being

Post Apocalypse, for example, there is a monster invasion, the map shows the invasion. But keeping the images and characters in games like "Jelly" and "Monster" to be cartoonish and approachable.

STORY:

The monster can take over the territory of the jelly, but not that Jelly will agree to act alone, the jelly has to invade to collect things to survive.

So who is the real invader !?
